title: Ep. 11 Amy Hoggart
itunes:title: Ep. 11 Amy Hoggart
itunes:subtitle: Cariad talks to comedian and writer Amy Hoggart
description:
Cariad talks to comedian and writer Amy Hoggart (Almost Royal, Full Frontal with Samantha Bee) about her dad's death from Pancreatic cancer in 2014. As ever they discuss grief, guilt + kundalini yoga.


You can tweet the show @thegriefcast, follow us on instagram @thegriefcast or email us thegriefcast@gmail.com because you are not alone.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
